# <font color="#FFFFFF">About<br>

Snow Valormae is a guitarist and composer based in the picturesque city of Christchurch, Aotearoa New Zealand. With a diverse musical background and a deep passion for exploring different genres, Snow's artistic journey has been a source of incredible inspiration.

Having completed her studies at the University of Canterbury, Snow Valormae's musical style is an intriguing blend of various genres, including metal, rock, jazz, and classical. Drawing from these diverse influences, she brings a unique and personal touch to her music. While Snow is skilled in playing multiple genres, her heart lies in composing and performing progressive metal music, as well as arranging jazz compositions.

Snow Valormae is currently an active member of the All Girls Big Band, contributing her guitar skills to create a harmonious and captivating sound. Additionally, she is working on two exciting projects behind the scenes. One project focuses on instrumental progressive metal, aiming to explore new boundaries within the genre, while the other project involves a jazz trio, where Snow delves into the expressive world of jazz arrangements.
